Anticipate movement within our competitive space and users to predict market trends and product needs.
Cultivate deep cross-collaboration between Product, Engineering, Marketing, Comms, Partnerships, and Developer teams. Become a trusted advisor to these departments. Ability to drive alignment with leadership on compelling strategies and sensitive topics.
Effectively communicate product details internally and externally. The goal is to make sure that all internal partners are fully up-to-speed on launch details and external partners have a smooth onboarding on any changes to their experience. 
Liaise with Product Management to support the vision for our roadmap through the eyes of our key audiences, users and developers. 
Collect and communicate compelling feedback to fuel consistent improvement to existing products and communication.
Report to the Sr. Director, Head of Product Marketing.

10+ years of product marketing experience preferably with a leading global platform (content, social, marketplace etc).
Experience leading omnichannel product marketing strategies.
Proficiency in messaging, positioning and marketing/content strategy.
Track record of driving cross-functional alignment and working closely with product stakeholders at all levels.
Effective being hands-on with individual projects and proven track record to lead multiple priorities simultaneously.
Proven experience delivering results in a fast-paced and multifaceted business environment.
Skills in delivering presentations, providing recommendations, and influencing decision-making at the executive level.
High attention to detail including precise and effective communications.
Managing experience providing strategic guidance, clear performance metrics, and professional development opportunities for team members.
Familiarity navigating safety and regulatory landscapes, as well as handling perceived risks with suitable product and messaging solutions.
